p: Today for the first time since we sent our stove back have I had warm tern water to wash dishes with - thanks to your dear helpfulness in sending the little stove, for which many thanks - We really need it now since it is quite chilly but until now it has been sort of a lark to let Daddy cook out for us every noon adn with Mrs Cantwell's good rang-

to bake our bread etc in we have managed quite pleasantly using our electric plate and percolator as well - No use in writing any more now since we are planning to drive up Sunday. I am so happy! We are well and very busy I want to make a Fall coat for Alice this week and she dances, we now think, Saturday evening at the Berummity Hall here -
